news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Berlin-based renewable energy supplier trawa raised €10 million in Seed funding to simplify energy purchasing and management for SMEs using an AI-powered platform. The funding aims to help SMEs reduce energy costs and emissions.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: trawa, Cleanwatts, Norsk Solar, Caban Systems, and neoom ag are all involved in the renewable energy sector. trawa focuses on Renewable Energy-as-a-Service, while Cleanwatts provides an Operating System for Energy Communities. Norsk Solar specializes in Renewable Energy, Caban Systems designs energy storage solutions, and neoom ag is a European Cleantech scale-up.

org_similarity_list.source_short_description: Operating System for Energy Communities - SaaS
Caban Systems designs a software enabled energy storage solution for telecom infrastructure providers worldwide.
neoom is a European Cleantech scale-up founded in Austria.
SNERPA Power develops intelligent energy services.
Orkestra is a renewable energy software platform.

overview_description.description: trawa offers software solutions and matching electricity procurement services for businesses. The offering enables energy-intensive companies to access renewable energy from solar- and wind parks and helps them decarbonize their operations while at the same time saving cost and protecting themselves against future energy crises.

properties.growth_insight_description: Berlin-based cleantech trawa raised €10 million to help SMEs reduce energy costs and emissions. Balderton Capital participated in this €10 million funding round.

product.name: AI-supported purchasing optimization
product.description: Uses AI to optimize electricity purchasing strategies, reducing costs and protecting against price fluctuations.

product.name: PPA direct contracts
product.description: Offers direct Power Purchase Agreements for cost-effective access to renewable energy, even for moderate consumption levels.

product.name: CO2 footprint reduction
product.description: Helps achieve up to 100% renewable electricity, providing real-time transparency about the electricity's origin and supporting regional solar and wind parks.

product.name: Analysis of consumption, costs, & emissions
product.description: Analyzes consumption patterns to provide transparency on costs and emissions, enabling data-driven planning.

product.name: Optimal renewable energy purchasing strategy
product.description: Uses algorithms to determine the best mix of renewable energy sources for a company's consumption patterns.

product.name: Procurement of genuine renewable energy
product.description: Facilitates access to renewable energy sources previously available only to large corporations, including solar and wind PPAs.
